block.p: Erin Suzanne Davy, a daughter of Gwen Garvey of Callawassie Island, S.C., and Robert M. Davy Sr. of Kearny, N.J., was married last evening to Mark David Weinberg, a son of Judith and Herbert Weinberg of Beachwood, Ohio. Cantor Sheldon Feinberg officiated at the Club on Callawassie Island.

Mrs. Weinberg, 33, is a senior vice president at Alan Taylor Communications, a New York public relations firm. She graduated from the C. W. Post Campus of Long Island University. Her father is the project director for the broker systems division of the New York Stock Exchange. She is a stepdaughter of Anita Davy and of James Garvey.

Erin Suzanne Davy, a daughter of Gwen Garvey of Callawassie Island, S.C., and Robert M. Davy Sr. of Kearny, N.J., was married last evening to Mark David Weinberg, a son of Judith and Herbert Weinberg of Beachwood, Ohio. Cantor Sheldon Feinberg officiated at the Club on Callawassie Island.

Mrs. Weinberg, 33, is a senior vice president at Alan Taylor Communications, a New York public relations firm. She graduated from the C. W. Post Campus of Long Island University. Her father is the project director for the broker systems division of the New York Stock Exchange. She is a stepdaughter of Anita Davy and of James Garvey.

Mr. Weinberg, 43, is the director of issues management at the McGraw-Hill Companies in New York, where he writes speeches and handles other company communications. During the Reagan administration, he was an assistant White House press secretary and a special assistant to the president. He graduated from George Washington University. His father is a commercial real estate development consultant in Beachwood.
